attributes.action: Scrap all parking fees for anyone who works in a hospital.
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS workers have worked tirelessly all through this pandemic and it's time we recognised their value.
attributes.background: Immediately stop parking charges in every hospital in England for all NHS workers

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow free parking for all NHS employees on NHS property or their place of work.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312828

Abolish car parking charges for hospital employees and their sub-contractors
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330751
